title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Beat eggs and mix with parmesan cheese.
Combine spaghetti with pancetta and remove from heat.
Quickly stir in egg and cheese mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with tikka paste and spices.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked.
Prepare sauce with tomato puree and cream.
Combine chicken with sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.
